item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo # Command Line # help : hugo --help generate folder public : hugo new content : hugo new posts/newpost.md , hugo new docs/newdocs.md Installation # Windows # install scoop Scoop installs the tools you know and love command: scoop install curl Make sure PowerShell 5 (or later, include PowerShell Core) and .NET Framework 4.5 (or later) are installed. Then run: command: Invoke-Expression (New-Object System.
